short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your standups with swift, automated task summaries and streamlined management—right from your Chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rocket Recap: Launch Your Daily Standups into Hyperdrive!

Take control of your team's daily standups with Rocket Recap, the ultimate Chrome extension for agile teams. Designed to streamline task management and maximise efficiency, Rocket Recap transforms your browser into mission control for your daily huddles. With just a click, access quick summaries, manage and prioritise tasks, and keep aligned and focused. Rocket Recap ensures your standups are productive and on-point. Get ready to blast your productivity to new heights—try Rocket Recap today!
